    • of

      @Internal public static MPI.Group of(long aPtr)

    • ptr_

      @Internal public long ptr_()

    • rank

      public int rank() throws MPIException
      返回:
      The rank of the calling process in the specified group. A value of MPI.UNDEFINED that the calling process is not a member of the specified group.
      抛出:
      MPIException

    • size

      public int size() throws MPIException
      返回:
      The size of the specified group.
      抛出:
      MPIException

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Free the group.
      指定者:
      shutdown 在接口中 IAutoShutdown
      指定者:
      shutdown 在接口中 IShutdownable

    • difference

      public MPI.Group difference(MPI.Group aRHS) throws MPIException
      Creates a new group from the difference between two existing groups.
      参数:
      aRHS - The second group.
      返回:
      A new MPI.Group that contains all elements in the first group that are not present in the second group. The function returns EMPTY if the new group is empty.
      抛出:
      MPIException
      另请参阅:
      • MPI_Group_difference function

    • excl

      public MPI.Group excl(int aN, int[] aRanks) throws MPIException
      A group constructor that is used to define a new group by deleting ranks from an existing group.
      参数:
      aN - The number of elements in the ranks parameter.
      aRanks - The arrays of processes in group that are not to appear in newgroup. The specified ranks must be valid in the existing group. Each element in the array must be distinct. If the array is empty then the new group will be identical to the existing group.
      返回:
      A new MPI.Group that is derived from the existing group. The order of the existing group is preserved in the new group.
      抛出:
      MPIException
      另请参阅:
      • MPI_Group_excl function

    • excl

      public MPI.Group excl(int[] aRanks) throws MPIException
      抛出:
      MPIException

    • incl

      public MPI.Group incl(int aN, int[] aRanks) throws MPIException
      Creates a new group that contains a subset of the processes in an existing group.
      参数:
      aN - The number of elements in the ranks parameter and the size of the new group.
      aRanks - The processes to be included in the new group.
      返回:
      A new MPI.Group, which contains the included processes in the order that they are specified in the ranks parameter.
      抛出:
      MPIException
      另请参阅:
      • MPI_Group_incl function

    • incl

      public MPI.Group incl(int[] aRanks) throws MPIException
      抛出:
      MPIException

    • intersection

      public MPI.Group intersection(MPI.Group aRHS) throws MPIException
      Creates a new group from the intersection of two existing groups.
      参数:
      aRHS - The second group.
      返回:
      A new MPI.Group with those elements that are present in both groups. The function returns EMPTY if the new group is empty.
      抛出:
      MPIException
      另请参阅:
      • MPI_Group_intersection function

    • union

      public MPI.Group union(MPI.Group aRHS) throws MPIException
      Creates a new group from the union of two existing groups.
      参数:
      aRHS - The second group.
      返回:
      A new MPI.Group that represents all elements in either group.
      抛出:
      MPIException
      另请参阅:
      • MPI_Group_union function
